subject: Implement Phase 8: Structure Selector Module
body:
Add intelligent decision tree wizard for guided model selection:

- Decision tree logic with 7 factor questions (IP ownership, cash flow,
  risk allocation, asset recognition, consolidation, software maturity,
  control preference)
- Scoring engine that calculates and normalizes model recommendations
- Step-by-step wizard UI with progress indicator
- Live preview of top recommendations while answering questions
- Variant recommendation logic for each model
- Rationale generation explaining why models are recommended
- Mode toggle between Wizard and Direct selection
- Integration with existing calculator UI
title: Implement Phase 8: Structure Selector Module
